flawed_nl_solution:
The second stack has 7 blocks + 3 blocks = <<7+3=13>>13 blocks.
The third stack has 13 blocks - 6 blocks = <<13-6=7>>7 blocks.
The fourth stack has 7 blocks + 10 blocks = <<7+10=17>>17 blocks.
The fifth stack has 13 blocks x 2 = <<13*2=26>>26 blocks.
In total there are 7 blocks + 13 blocks + 7 blocks + 17 blocks + 26 blocks = <<7+13+7+17+26=70>>70 blocks.
#### 70

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
